name: v1.2.13
body: - Update dependencies

name: v1.2.12
body: - Fix float32 decoding when number of decimal >= 10

name: v1.2.11
body: - Deterministic code generation (keep the same order for keys)

name: v1.2.10
body:
- Built in slices
- Replaced generator

name: v1.2.9
body: - Reset keys when encoding nested object without keys

name: v1.2.8
body: - Add `Index()` method on decoder to get current array index when decoding an array

name: v1.2.7
body: - Optimise encoding buffer creation to only create a new buffer when usin `Marshal` as `Decode` api writes directly to the io.Writer. Doing this, using the `Decode` leads to less allocation.

name: v1.2.6
body: - Fix bug producing an error when skipping string with escaped unicode

name: v1.2.5
body: - Fix concurrency bug on Marshal methods reusing the same buffer

name: v1.1.4
body: - Fix bug producing an error when skipping string with escaped unicode

name: v1.1.3
body: - Fix concurrency bug on Marshal methods reusing the same buffer

name: v1.0.4
body: - Fix concurrency bug on Marshal methods reusing the same buffer

name: v1.2.4
body:
- Add decode null feature (taking a pointer to a pointer and leaving it untouched if `null` is encountered in JSON)
- Add encoding with keys methods (encodes only the given keys for an object)
- Add interface decoding (decode unknown interface values using standard JSON)

name: v1.2.3
body:
- Add `NullEmpty` encoding method to encode `null` when value is empty
- Add `Null` and `NullKey` methods on Encoder to encode a `null`

name: v1.2.2
body: Fix bug on skip string when escaped solidus is present

name: v1.2.1
body: Fix escape sequence bug on skipArray and skipObject

name: v1.2.0
body:
- Add types
SQLNullTypes
time.Time
- Fix and enhance escape sequence when decoding string

name: v1.1.2
body: Fix bug on escape sequence when skipping objects and arrays

name: v1.1.1
body:
- Fix bug in code generator when writing to a file in the same package. Generator now creates the destination file at the end. 
- Fix bug when null values are decoded on some number types and cursor is not updated properly

name: v1.1.0
body:
- Code generator for struct, slices, maps
- Adding new types for encoding/decoding
- Updating doc
- Adding tests

name: v1.0.3
body:
- Fix bug with one decimal introduced in previous patch
- Add tests

name: v1.0.2
body:
- Fix cases where parsing malformed numbers caused panics
- Make negative number decoding to uint values return an InvalidUnmarshalError inline with `encoding/json`
- Add gofuzz helper
- Clean exponent syntax building

name: v1.0.1
body:
- Fix cases where malformed JSON number could cause panic 
- Add go-fuzz in examples

name: v1.0.0
body:
- Follow RFC7159 (Exponent syntax for numbers, unicode code point syntax tests) 
- optimise Unsafe API 
- simplify API 
- thorough test suite
- Use sync.Pool to pool decoders and encoders

name: v0.10.6
body:
- Add int64 encoding methods 
- optimisations 
- fix bug on in array object key encoding

name: v0.10.5
body:
- Add support for EmbeddedJSON 
- Optimise Encoding

name: v0.10.4
body:
- Add escape of control characters in encoding
- Add DecodeObjectFunc and EncodeObjectFunc types 
- Add tests

name: v0.10.3
body:
- Fix potential issue with io.ReadCloser
- Add examples with http package

name: v0.10.2
body:
- Adding support to parse all keys when NKeys returns 0 
- Adding tests an docs

name: v0.10.1
body:
- Improvements to io.Reader handling in decode API 
- Adding examples

name: v0.10.0
body:
- Stream Encoding API 
- io.Writer support 
- simplification of API

name: v0.9.0
body: Initial version
